comments.body: This is the bug fix. Cleaning of `storage` and `createTime` is not enough. `tableMeta` can have other "temporary" fields.

    tableMeta = CatalogTable.normalize(tableMeta),
    dataCols = dataCols.zipWithIndex.map {
      case (attr, index) => attr.withExprId(ExprId(index))

comments.body: Should we sort by entire strings (._1 and ._2)? For example, if you have `key0 = b` and `key0 = a`, you may get unstable output either `[key0 = b, key0 = a]` or `[key0 = a, key0 = b]`
ah, sorry, we can guarantee uniqueness of keys.
